mutations.name: Mythic Quantum Supremacy
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's particles to achieve perfect quantum supremacy
mutations.effectDescription: Particles achieve perfect quantum supremacy, existing in all possible states simultaneously

mutations.name: Mythic Perfect Crystal
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's particles into a divine crystalline structure
mutations.effectDescription: Particles form a divine crystalline structure of perfect symmetry and resilience

mutations.name: Mythic Stellar Core
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's particles into a miniature stellar core
mutations.effectDescription: Particles form a miniature stellar core with ongoing fusion reactions

mutations.name: Mythic Void Mastery
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's particles to achieve perfect mastery over void energies
mutations.effectDescription: Particles achieve perfect mastery over void energies, allowing complete phasing through physical matter

mutations.name: Mythic Primordial Essence
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's particles into primordial essence from the beginning of creation
mutations.effectDescription: Particles transform into primordial essence, capable of adapting to any situation with perfect efficiency
